Lane Layouts

Auto-fill grids with lanes-min/lanes-max attributes for column sizing.
Use lanes-min="10rem" to set minimum column width.

Lanes 2

2-column lanes layout <lay-out sm="lanes(2)">

Lanes 3

3-column lanes layout <lay-out sm="lanes(2)" lg="lanes(3)">

Lanes 4

4-column lanes layout <lay-out sm="lanes(2)" lg="lanes(4)">

Lanes 5

5-column lanes layout <lay-out sm="lanes(2)" lg="lanes(5)">

Lanes 6

6-column lanes layout <lay-out sm="lanes(2)" lg="lanes(6)">

Lanes auto

Auto-fill lanes with configurable sizing via lanes-min/lanes-max attributes <lay-out sm="lanes(2)" lg="lanes(auto)">
